data.message: Look I support Trump and I still listen to Eminem and I dont care if Eminem dont like it. That being said Walk on Water sucks hope its not a foreshadowing of the record to come

replies.message: You suck! "Walk On Water" is beautiful!!!
just as beautiful as you are
Then you are not a real supporter
Who made you the determiner of that?
"Do you fools even listen to music or do you just skim through it?"
Agreed!
Walk on water was shit
Not a song i like by Em, but I will say when he and Skylar Grey performed it the other day it sounded worlds better than Beyonce
Bitch I made Stan makes me think it's the beginning if his new album wherever the fuck that is 😭
Stephen Allen your a fucking asshole man. Not surprised you support trump with the way you treat women. Didn’t you hear his freestyle. EM don’t want u as a fan brain dead fucker
UMM how do I treat women lol?

How does walk on water suck? His word play is incredible he wrote a song speaking about real shit in his life. Just because it wasn't hype doesn't mean it wasn't good. It was literally like poetry let's see anyone else do as good of a Job as Eminem... they can't!
Dude it sounds robotic as hell and forced as fuck. He had no flow it sounds  like he's literally trying to force every syllable to rhyme its horrible
Eminem new album is fucking shit get over it losers
I love Eminem but that song DOES suck. Not every song an artist puts out is good. His lyrics were on point but it didn’t mesh with the beat or Beyoncé’s part.
Walk on water will go down as a top 15 song by em. Maybe higher.
Walk on water wouldnt even be the best song on Encore or Relapse his two worst albums
How the fuck is encore and relapse his worst albums?? This mother fucker retarded 👆🏻
Cause they are even Em himself hated them you cunt
you were like 2 years old when Eminem was hot shut your fanboy ass up you Rob Dyrdek reject

Saying you're a eminem fan just to make your "walk on water is suck" point relevant is kinda bs. Too common from most Trump supporters these days those who even didn't listen to Eminem even before "The Storm". Walk On Water can put right next to Stan. Although I kinda wish it was Skylar Grey instead of Beyonce.
I thought the song was aight, he's definitely put out better music. His bashing of Trump hasn't changed my viewpoint of him because I know he was forced into it by the zionists.
Walk on Water was meh, but it’s usually what he puts out with another big name for the radio
Aakash Verma shut your dumb ass up ill judge what or whomever the fuck I please lol
